code: import{configureStore}from"@reduxjs/toolkit";import productReducer from"./productSlice";import categoryReducer from"./categorySlice";import modalReducer from"./modalSlice";import cartReducer from"./cartSlice";import{searchReducer}from"../components/Navbar/Navbar";var store=configureStore({reducer:{product:productReducer,category:categoryReducer,modal:modalReducer,cart:cartReducer,search:searchReducer}});export default store;
